column5: Our home is located in a quiet neighborhood about 13 miles from downtown. The room we listed comfortably fits 2 people, with a second room available for 2 more.   *This Room is currently not available however view our other room!  https://airbnb.com/rooms/6809949?s=8&user_id=31114712&ref_device_id=c14439a87cf440aa48285e51afb37025270e7eb2 *
column8: Cozy and Friendly Home in the ATX
